phrases: I am going to have to take back that Let us pretend nothing happened.
I still like you, after all.
You got a problem with that?
Seriously, Umibouzu's wife, could not you have done better?
Look, here is another picture of you looking lame.
I took it using my own camera.
No good will come of you having that picture.
I could print out a few more copies and put them up in the hallway.
Is that how you treat the guy you like?
Why do you have to say stuff like that?!
It is your fault, no matter how you look at it.
Now I am definitely going to print more copies!
I will make a hundred copies and hand them out with tissues in front of the station.
The data is still stored in my camera, anyway.
Otani knows my biggest weakness now.
This is not the time to get mad.
I thought you were going to make Otani-kun regret rejecting you.
That is easier said than done.
Nevertheless, do not make that ugly face!
Why did he reject you in the first place?
It was because he thinks of you as his comedy partner, right?
You cannot just keep doing comedy with him like before.
Exactly, bare your chest completely and move forward!
Then do a lap of the station area!
I mean show that kind of attitude!
What the heck is a chest baring attitude?
A year sure goes by quickly, huh?
What, are you an old woman?
What was your relationship with Kanzaki-san like?
What is with this all of a sudden?!
It would bother anyone in my position.
Well you guys were not ever a comedy duo, were you.
The girl Otani went out with...
I want to become the girl that Otani likes.
What should I give my darling for Christmas?
Chiharu-chan, what are you going to give Suzuki-kun?
Well, last year I gave him a sweater...
Risa, you do not have any plans for Christmas this year, right?
Why do not you ask Otani-kun out?
Tell him you want to spend Christmas eve together, just the two of you.
There is no way I could say something so embarrassing!
He already knows you like him, and nothing could be more embarrassing than that, right?
I still like you, after all.
I am remembering pointless things again!
I am so embarrassed I could die!
I should never have told him!
You will be fine, you will be fine.
Everyone loves whilst fighting against embarrassment.
How did you get together with Nakao-chi, Nobu-chan?
It was a winter's day, when the rain was cold as snow...
It is a former gang leader, Nakao-kun.
I heard he put twenty delinquents from another school in the hospital all by himself.
Stray cat, please take me in
I live in an apartment, so I cannot take you in.
And then one day, I was picked on by some delinquents,
And then I put a love letter in his locker...
In our last year of middle school, we attended the same cram school and became friends.
I said to him, If only I had a boyfriend like you, Nakao-kun...
And he said, If only I had a girlfriend like you, Nobu-chan...
And then it was like, So why do not we go out?
I have had enough of drama.
The person you like likes you back.
That is pretty impressive in itself.
It is almost a miracle, in fact.
You got your miracle easily enough, and things have gone well with Suzuki-kun.
You two should be more thankful to God.
It-It-It is just me that is...
He did not say that he did not like you at all.
But I cannot bare my chest!
No one told you to do it literally!
I meant mentally bare your chest!
Reveal the inner breasts that lie deep within your heart!
Mine are not as big as yours, Nobu-chan.
This has nothing to do with size.
I think you should lower your voice...
You can do it if you really want to!
Just use a bit of charm and Otani-kun will be done for.
So you are tall like a model.
I want Otani to fall in love with me.
I will give it a try!
First, I will need to find a Christmas present for him.
Here I am, desperately trying to bare my chest to you...
Uh... anyway... are you free for Christmas?
So you are doing something for Christmas?
My middle school's basketball club is getting together for a Christmas party.
So it is like the one that Kanzaki-san invited you to last year, but you did not go?
T-Then Kanzaki-san will be going too?
She was the manager, after all.
I am telling you, there is nothing going on between me and that girl, okay.
You are calling her that girl?
He just said, There is nothing going on between me and that girl.
I would like to be able to say something like that myself.
Last year, he hung out with me.
I did make plans with you first, right?
But that was because of the Umibouzu concert.
It is not like he considered me more important than his ex-girlfriend.
I knew it, but I was still happy.
Without an Umibouzu ticket, I am just an All-Kyojin to be rejected.
Go have a merry Christmas with that girl.
And then, when you just happen to get back together,
To the Christmas party, I mean.
I do not have anything to do with your middle school.
It is a party, but we will be playing a bit of basketball too, so the more the merrier, right?
The Nakao couple are coming too.
This is the first I have heard of it.
Well, we can spend Christmas Eve alone together,
They said they already ordered a cake.
We are going to eat it in the gym?
Will not we get in trouble?
Time for the great Christmas plan.
Bare your chest, and more forward!
Whether it is an ex-girlfriend or whatever, bring it on!
Using my chest baring power, I will make Otani fall for me!
Otani-sempai is as short as always.
I will smack you for that, damn it.
The ex-girlfriend is not here yet?
Manager Kanzaki could not make it today.
So are you two back together yet or what?
I told you there is nothing going on between us.
And you, do not look so obviously happy about it.
She is just an amazon who is in the same class as me.
So she is not your girlfriend?
She does not look like she would be, huh.
Could not you have phrased that better?
Do not you have a sense of kindness or compassion?
It is not like I said anything wrong!
You did not say anything right, you microbe.
You did not bare your chest.
Anyway, how is this a Christmas party?
Apparently we will be having a cake later.
The sweaty look does not suit you at all, darling.
Why do not you guys join in too?
I did not bring my sneakers.
So why could not Kanzaki make it?
And we were going to go to all that effort to get her and Otani back together too...
But does not she have a boyfriend?
We could have just passed that off as a thing of the past...
Otani liked Kanzaki-san a lot, after all.
It was like he died after they broke up.
I thought that it would bother Koizumi-san if I mentioned it.
Hey, what were Otani and Kanzaki-san like as a couple?
Well, Otani was head over heels in love.
Before they started going out, he would get so nervous he could barely speak around her.
So we thought it would be funny to lock the two of them in the storeroom together.
After they got out, they started going out.
Who knows what happened in there.
I wonder what could have happened...
And you two, how long are you planning on drawing out that break for?
In front of someone he likes, he gets so nervous he can barely speak...
Hey, Otani, are you interested in that girl?
Well, she does not seem your type at all, but...
It is rare to find a girl as fun as her.
Oh, so you kind of like her then?
I will get everyone to help.
Risa, we will get yelled at if we eat cake in here, so we are going to eat outside.
Oh, before that, could you put this ball back in the storeroom?
Hey, was that a click just now?
We will come and open the door later.
She told me to bare my chest.
Do not expose such a dangerous area.
H-H-H-How do you know about that?!
In this dark room, all alone with Kanzaki-san, what did you do?
Considering you were so nervous you could not even talk straight,
Damn it, those guys are going to pay!
Well, I guess it was something like that.
I already told you, that was in the past.
You sure have been crying a lot lately, Koizumi.
Who do you think is to blame for that?!
Do not look so genuinely surprised.
I brought it on a whim.
It is pointless keeping it, so I will give it to you.
But I did not get anything for you.
It is not like I was expecting anything.
You really like me that much?
Stop blabbering pointless things like that!
Hurry up and open the door, Nobu-chan!
It is funny, is not it?
What the hell is wrong with you?!
Maybe you really do have a bad personality!
It is Christmas, so it would be nice if a miracle happened to me.
Kanzaki broke up with her boyfriend?
Otani is going to be swept off his feet by his ex-girlfriend.
You are overdoing it with the adrenaline.
A Love Revival With the Ex?!
A Love Revival With the Ex?!
